name: Overtale is Underrated
description:
"Instead of simply “knocking” Undertale for everything about it that is “not as good as people say that it is”, my intent here is to expose WHY people tend to overrate it, HOW they overrate it, and WHAT THIS IMPLIES about the Gaming Community and the Global Culture as a Whole, specifically among the youth."

This is a submission to the Forgotten Games Essay Jam.

Rinzai Gigen,

Subliminal Mind Games.

[({R.G.||S.M.G.)}]
